alert.note: Alert for Central Interior (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 24 at 2:22PM AKST until January 25 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. Blowing snow reducing visibility to one half mile or less at times. Heavy drifting snow. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph along the highway summits. * WHERE...Central Interior. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Windy conditions with blowing and drifting snow will occur over Elliott Highway Summits.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
